group_1.textLeft: ...Huh? Charu?
What are you doing here so late at night...?

group_1.textRight: I'm gonna go look for them!
Shizuka, you're gonna look too, right? Right!

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean, you're gonna look for them...?@The daidaikko?

group_1.textRight: No, no! Selling points!@I'm gonna look for some selling points!

group_1.textLeft: S-slow down for a sec...why don't you come inside?

group_1.textRight: Oh, Sunao, you're here, too!

group_1.textLeft: Good evening, Charu.
Hey, Charu! Welcome!
Did you want to stop by for dinner?

group_1.textRight: No, I'll be fine, my mom's making it for me!

group_1.textLeft: But aren't you going somewhere else right now?
Umm...what exactly are you about to do?

group_1.textRight: So! We're going to look for this village's unique@sense of charm!

group_1.textLeft: Charu, stop, your body is shaking all over...

group_1.textRight: I can't! This is what the shogun does!
"The Shaking Shogun"...
I've heard of him from somewhere, but...

group_1.textLeft: Is he actually a real person?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...I can't quite recall.
He may be based on an actual shogun, but...
The shogun stumbled across an impoverished village@while he was going undercover.
Despite their suffering, the villagers were really kind@to him. He couldn't just leave them like that.
So he looked for the unique qualities that the village@had, and helped the villagers figure out how they@could make money off them!

group_1.textLeft: Wow...! I think I heard an old story just like that@when I was little.
In other words, what you want to do is...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I want to find the appeal of our village, and@capitalize on it!
I know that everyone thinks this is just some dumpy@old village...
But there might be some attractions we haven't@figured out yet!

group_1.textLeft: Attractions, huh...

group_1.textRight: Maybe the Tokimes buried some treasure...
Or maybe the descendants of fallen warriors are@hiding somewhere in the mountains.
Or there could be pandas secretly living around@here...

group_1.textLeft: I...don't think there are any pandas...

group_1.textRight: We don't know for sure, though!@We haven't found any yet!
Even the shogun was shocked when he found@a panda and some descendants!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, so you were pulling those ideas from the show...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Shizuka, what do you think?!
Um, Shizuka...?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry...
Is the Tokime buried treasure something we can@find if we look for it?

group_1.textRight: No, that's not the case...it's just a legend.

group_1.textLeft: A legend...?
But the descendants of fallen warriors aren't just a@legend, right?
There might be other villages like ours...

group_1.textRight: Oh dear...

group_1.textLeft: And, um, what's a panda? Is it some animal that@lives in the mountain?

group_1.textRight: Shizuka, you really are clueless, aren't you...?!
I'll tell you all about them on our way over!

group_1.textLeft: On our way over...where?

group_1.textRight: Oh, Sunao!
We're gonna go find the village's appeal, just like@the shogun!
I bet the three of us can find it before dinner!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hold on!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: It's dark outside, isn't it?
If we go out now, your dinner will get cold.
Your mom will be worried, too.

group_1.textCenter: There's no need to rushâ€” appeal isn't something@that will vanish overnight.
Why don't we start our search tomorrow?

group_1.textRight: Ugh...
...Okay! That's a promise!

group_1.textCenter: Shizuka, you really are clueless, aren't you...?!
